Create a book 1. Press the button with plus sign which is in the lower right corner of the main screen. 2. Fill in each of the attributes of the new book. 3. In the end, press the save button. Edit 1. Make a long click on the item to modify. 2. Press "Edit". 3. Modify the attributes and click the save button. Delete 1. Make a long click on the item to delete. A message will confirm that the book has been deleted. Search 1. Press the down arrow button to choose a search configuration. 2. There are two kind of search: by tittle or by author. 3. Press the magnifying glass button to search a book. 4. Select the book. Sort the list by an attribute 1. Press the options button situated in the upper right corner. 2. Select the desired order.
